message: Just added my details. the 9th sounds great ^H^H^H invites for the bootcamp? that's great!!!

@nmelo Nelson, checking my flight ticket I noticed I arrive at 10:30pm on the 9th so I won't be able to make it that day. If it can be on the 11th after Google IO great, if not, don't worry, I will do the tour next year which I'll definitely plan with more days.
@julio_menendez....actually, Steph Liu from GTUGs just announced we are getting invites for Bootcamp, so we might have to move it for the 11th after all! Stay tuned!
I have no news from my Github friend, I ll ping him again :)
